title: Shiny Surprise
message: You almost trip over a weathered purse half-buried in the dirt.

title: Grateful Trader
message: A traveling trader thanks you for pointing out a shortcut and presses a gift into your hands.

title: Tumbled Satchel
message: A canvas satchel spills its contents on the path, revealing a few forgotten coins.

title: Street Performer
message: A performer bows gratefully after you lend a hand with their setup.

title: Lucky Rain
message: A sudden rain showers the trail with sparkling drops that harden into usable coins.

title: Returned Favor
message: You reunite a passerby with their lost pouch, and they insist on rewarding you.

title: Snare Trap
message: A concealed snare whips out of the underbrush, lashing at your lead companion!

title: Sudden Sandstorm
message: A wall of grit sweeps across the path, battering everyone in your party.

title: Visit from the Book Fairy
message: A shimmering book fairy alights on a nearby shoulder and shares a secret.

title: Chilling Mist
message: A cold mist settles over the trail, sapping enthusiasm from your companions.

title: Nursery News
message: A caretaker from the daycare rushes over, beaming.

title: Egg Checkup
message: You receive a quick update from the daycare attendants.

title: Strange Creature Sighting
message: While exploring the area, your party encounters a species native to this country that you have never seen before.
